name: Finch Basil Leaves
description:
Use this top-notch basil to add some finishing flair to your ratatouille, vegetarian chili, or any
tomato-based meal. Basil works beautifully with thyme, tarragon, anise, cloves, cinnamon, and other spices as well as
lemon and lime. Basil tea is also highly delicious *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
